item.title: I Hate Screen Protectors
item.description: I just bought a new iPad and of course I had to install a screen protector. Why wouldnâ€™t I? A brand new iPad needs to be protected, right? The case for the Screen Protector I bought the best screen protector money can buy, Paperlike. Paperlike is excellent for when using the Apple Pencil; it gives a bit of friction to the pencil to feel (and sound) a bit like paper when drawing or writing on the screen.
